content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Yi-Nuo Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the rental price of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] As the landlord, I believed the price could be higher and did not want to continue negotiating at the proposed prices.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I would not provide a rating.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Why would you not provide a rating?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] As the landlord, my focus was on the negotiation and the rental price, not on rating the likeability of the negotiation partner.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator
